transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Haa bolo ja raha hai.
Executive: Good morning sir. Sir kaise hain? Good morning. Vijay ji hain?
Customer: Haan ji sir, Vijay bol raha hun aawaz se.
Executive: Number change ho gaya aapka?
Customer: Kya sir?
Executive: Number change ho gaya?
Customer: Number kya sir?
Executive: Change ho gaya aapka?
Customer: Nahi number change.
Executive: Sir ye na ye alag alternate matlab alag jaise aapka ticket open hota hai us par jata hai.
Customer: Mera number wohi rahega. Wohi hai mera number. Kuch change nahi hua hai. Sir ek cheez puchni thi aapne call kiya tha?
Executive: Nahi.
Customer: Okay. Sir aapka jo primary number hai na usse miscall aaya tha isiliye ki agar koi issue ho.
Customer: Koi issue toh nahi hai sir?
Executive: Koi issue nahi hai. Are kaun hai kaun madam baat karte rehti hai yaar. Woh sab woh samjhaiye ki ekdum side rahe. Faltu ka humko aur pareshan hum mera maatha kharab din bhar hum busy rehte hain. Jahan koi phone kar diya aapke alawa koi na hum usse usko pehle hi hum ladke bhaga dete hain.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Ha hum kisi se bolna bhi nahi chahte hain. Ekdum aap khud hi baat kijiye.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Ha. Theek hai. Toh ek toh ye log apna pralobhan lekar ke aate hain. Main bol diya hun aapko ki main lunga toh lunga. Aapse hi lunga. Mera koi koi convince karne wala bina koi aaye na koi humse baat kare.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Sir woh na meri jo mere senior manager hain. Isiliye senior manager hai toh jawab hai. Pehle aap baat ye tab koi aur baat kare. Apne man se nahi.
Customer: Theek hai main main aage se main hi baat karunga. Sir koi issue nahi pata bolo bolo. Jawab dalte hain le lijiye le lijiye. Are main keh diya ki aakhri ke 15 din mein ya January mein main lunga toh lunga baat khatam ho gayi.
Customer: Mera bhi isme hai na.
Executive: Haan. Haan haan. Sir woh isiliye keh rahe hain taki aapki jo service hai na woh band na ho toh matlab pattern break na ho jaye.
Customer: Pattern break kaise aap pura jab tak mera service aap de rahe hain ki nahi de rahe hain ye bataiye.
Executive: Haan. Woh toh denge sir hum.
Customer: Jab utna de hi rahe hain toh phir ab wahan tak woh karne dijiye. Main bol diya hun ki dekhiye main apne shop pe rehta nahi hun. Jab rehta nahi hun na toh humko zarurat hai aapka. Theek hai?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Haan. Aapka zarurat hai mahina mein ek hi customer aa jaye bas hum utna hi zyada se matlab nahi hai. Ek hi customer ready ho jaye toh aath customer milta hai tab ek koi ek ready hota hai.
Executive: Toh sir abhi tak hua nahi hua koi?
Customer: Abhi kuch nahi hua. Woh jo the na Pantnagar bada site tha. Toh woh hold pe rakh diye ek mahina ke liye.
Executive: Okay. Uske baad. Toh hum usi ke bharose pade hue hain. Uske baad abhi koi nahi. Kal ek baat kiya tha ek apne hi Gaya mein hi. Toh woh bhi unka bhi late hai 10 din.
Executive: 10 din late hai. Hmm. Matlab kis wajah se kuch dikkat hai un logo ko?
Customer: Dikkat kya hai aap aisa service diye hai service mein aap hai ki online mein direct online phone kiya call kiya bas yahi toh hai.
Executive: Okay. Ye cheez hai. Sahi nahi hai. Aap aaiye mere paas. Haan. Ye direct call aaya tha ya inquiry aayi thi? Inquiry ke through aaya tha?
Customer: Inquiry ke direct call aaya tha.
Executive: Okay direct call aaya. Chaliye sir bol dijiye. Aur sir bylead se kuch aa raha hai?
Customer: Bylead se kuch nahi mil raha hai. Direct wohi hum toh kehte hain ki mahina mein ek hi mil jaye humko bahut hai. Ek bhi nahi milta hai na.
Executive: Sir kal Gaya ka hi ek ceramic volt time Gaya ki bylead aayi aapne check kari thi?
Customer: Abhi kuch nahi election abhi election duty mein busy hun. Samajh rahe hain? Sir nahi haan woh toh main samajh raha hun. Lekin sir bylead consume karne mein kitna time lagta hai ye bhi toh dekhiye.
Executive: Achha achha.
Customer: Ek baar check karoge sir abhi check kar lo. Sir aap busy ho jaoge. Call pe rehte hue check kar lo.
Customer: Na main bahut busy hun. Gaadi chala rahe hain aur aapse baat kar rahe hain. Idhar ek hamare aadmi unse bhi baat kar rahe hain. Hum thodi der mein phone kar lenge. Humko malum hai do Gaya ke do byleads hain dono pe phone karna hai mujhe.
Executive: Aur sir ek aur ek aur hai ye hai Rohtas ka. Rohtas Bihar kitni door hai aapse?
Customer: Ye sab nahi aayenge. Rohtas wale yahan se 150 kilometer saman le hi nahi jayenge.
Executive: Ye ye jo sir stainless steel railing ka hai.
Customer: Achha achha achha. Haan railing ka hai. Aur ye ek Siwan mein bhi hai railing ka hi hai ye bhi. Door ke naam pe party dekhiye dekhiye door ke naam pe party yahi bolta hai ki nahi ho payega. Aur woh check rate check karega uske baad apna pickup kar jayega block list kar gaya mujhe.
Executive: Okay. Isiliye sir byleads aapko byleads aapko ab railing ki zyada aa rahi hain.
Customer: Railing hi chahiye dijiye na bhai railing ke hi dijiye.
Executive: Haan railing ki hi aa rahi hain sir. Gopalganj ki ek phir Nalanda ki bhi hai.
Customer: Theek hai. Hum toh din bhar free hai parso. Parso. Haan parso din bhar free honge kyunki election mera aajkal hai toh aajkal ke baad main parso din bhar free rahunga. Usi din lekin us din aap pakka mera mera likh lijiye kal parso mujhe aapse baat karna hi hai.
Executive: Theek hai aur ye Gaya wali jo bylead hai na aapko ceramic volt time ki ispe ek baar baat kar lijiye. 500 square feet ki hai aur ye 16 ghante pehle aayi hai.
Customer: Are bahut chota customer hai woh.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Haan bahut zyada chota customer hai. Halaaki main free hun toh. Haan main abhi tumhare ko phone kar raha hun. kariye kyunki kyunki taki pattern ban jaye aapka Gaya ka. Gaya ki byleads aap aaye taki aage.
Executive: Achha theek hai theek okay. Haan. Theek hai sir okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving too many promotional calls.

- Customer wants to only deal with one executive.

- Customer is not getting enough quality buyleads.

- Customer is busy with election duties.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to handle the account personally.

- Executive assured to provide railing buyleads.

- Executive offered to call back later.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer the day after tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, railing, election duty
